entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
